bullets: Enabled non-developers to create Yext Pages in seconds by building a visual editor in a team of eight with React and Go.

Boosted frontend response time from 5.4s to 2.1s by optimizing MySQL query algorithms for filtering and pagination.
Enhanced backend maintainability by refactoring 60,000+ lines of JavaScript into AWS Lambda serverless functions.
Mentor 15 students each semester in building full-stack applications with Django, AWS S3, CI/CD, and RESTful APIs.
Facilitate sprint planning and refinement workshops to enable student teams to excel in agile environments.
Guide 400+ students during weekly office hours on object-oriented programming and Java testing frameworks.
Simplify concepts such as OOP, TDD, REST, design patterns, and Git to strengthen practical software skills for students.
Refined data quality for a National Science Foundation project by developing Python scripts to clean and format data.
Facilitated linear regression analysis by aggregating COVID-19 mobility data from 1.8 million U.S. locations.
